title: Downloads
text:
Below are all files currently available for download.
#| echo: false #| message: false #| warning: false

Ensure the folder exists (safe if it already does)
dir.create(“downloads/files”, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)


List files in downloads/files
files <- list.files(“downloads/files”, full.names = TRUE)
if (length(files) == 0) { cat(“(No files uploaded yet)”) } else { names <- basename(files) sizes_mb <- round(file.info(files)$size / (1024^2), 2)
df <- data.frame( File = sprintf(“%s”, names, names), Size_MB = sizes_mb, stringsAsFactors = FALSE )
knitr::kable(df, format = “html”, escape = FALSE) }
